Package org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.canvas

Interface Summary
CanvasPattern Implemented by interfaces which want to allow pattern-fill rendering on the Canvas
CanvasReadyCallback Invoked when the creation of a Canvas succeeds and is ready for rendering
DisplayList A DisplayList is a Layer with deferred execution.
FontRendererService Service which uses Java2D to compute font metrics of a series of glyphs for the given font and rotation, as well as returning the URL of a fontbook rendering of the glyphs
FontRendererServiceAsync Async interface for the FontRendererService
Layer Layer is a core Chronoscope drawing abstraction

It is the key immediate-mode render API used for drawing shapes, corresponding very close to the Safari/WHATWG Javascript CANVAS.
PaintStyle Tagging interface for fill/stroke styles
RadialGradient RadialGradients must implement this interface
ViewReadyCallback Interface used by View implements to notify clients when the View is ready for use.
 

Class Summary
AbstractLayer  
Bounds Helper class representing a rectangular bounds
Canvas Fundamental graphics rendering system of Chronoscope

Canvas is the fundamental graphcis rendering system of Chronoscope.
CanvasFontMetrics Helper class to cache font related information
Color Represents a PaintStyle which is an RGBA color
DefaultDisplayListImpl Helper class for implementors getting started with Custom Canvas/Layer implementations

not really intended for real use, just a placeholder with no performance benefit (indeed, a deficit).
FontRendererService.FontRenderServiceUtil  
RenderedFontMetrics Used by FontRendererService to transfer Java2D font metrics information
View View encapsulate platform specific behaviors, such as graphics rendering, timing, and CSS property retrieval.
